TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityDesignerBuildProvider extends System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider

Docs.summary: Extracts the model and mapping portions of .edmx files under the App_Code directory of an ASP.NET Web site, and embeds them as resources in the assembly that is dynamically compiled by the ASP.NET runtime.

Docs.summary: Generates C# or Visual Basic code based on the model and mapping portions of an .edmx file.
